name: Ruby Robbers
description:
This is a game made during a game jam where my 9 years old son did the art.

WASD to move. Mouse to aim and shoot.

Get the highest score by killing the Robbers before they stole all the ruby part. If they do... you have to get the ruby back from the king in the other room and then return to killing robbers.

*constructive feedback is welcomed*
